law.catch_line: Notification of treatment planning conferences and reviews.
law.text: The cabinet shall notify the CASA volunteer, the CASA program, and the court when it schedules treatment planning conferences and reviews.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 245, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1990.
